alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Howard (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 6:53PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Howard, northwestern Clayton, Fayette, Allamakee, Winneshiek and eastern Chickasaw Counties through 745 PM CST... At 653 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cresco to Fayette. Movement was northeast at 95 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Postville around 705 PM CST. Monona around 710 PM CST. Lansing around 720 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Volney, County Roads A 52 And W 60, Vernon Springs, Nordness, Giard, Quandahl, Sattre, County Roads V 56 And B 33, Waucoma Campground and National. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
